duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing industrial maintenance and repair on various systems and equipment including motors, gearboxes, hydraulic systems, pneumatic systems, compressors, and fluid pumps.
Troubleshooting and repairing electrical service and systems, including reading electrical diagrams and wiring instructions, 480V, and industrial electrical systems.
Facility support including light plumbing, carpentry, welding, and machining or metal fabrication.
Supporting other Journeys and other department personnel on combined (electrical and mechanical) projects.
